text: Subject: Update on CAD Round-Up Feature and Beta Opt-In Opportunity

Hi Karen,

Thanks so much for your patience regarding the rollout of our CAD round-up feature—I apologize for the unexpected delay.
Your feedback has been invaluable, and we sincerely appreciate your understanding as we work diligently to get everything right.
I'm happy to share that we’re firmly committed to enabling CAD round-up accounts by 1 July 2025.
To ensure a smooth transition, we’ll be offering early beta access starting next week, and we’d love to have you participate.
You’ll receive a follow-up email with detailed instructions on how to opt in.
If you have any further questions or need assistance during this process, feel free to reach out.

Warm regards,  
The SaveRound Team  
support@saveround.io
